text.content:
Equipment

Ammunition

Arrows and bolts

All arrows and bolts now weight 0.05 Enc

Crossbows:

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.U9l2QD8tOLvPTf9B]{Barbed Bolt}

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.jCZpu8nn4FrKhMD0]{Bodkin Bolt}

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.4YiC9X4ChJtRyksH]{Sharp Stick}

Bows:

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.2QtHtgvboMiWWy9R]{Fire Arrows}

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.jdPZnwAAhHDDpHM5]{Poisoned Arrows}

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.TJizFChH9KrY9uCg]{Winged Arrow}

Slings:

All sling-bullets now weight 0.08 Enc

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.wIvdnJBh5SEqBdxA]{Cracker Bullet}

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.wDDrn1tCn6sR3ShM]{Razor Bullet}

Blackpowder

All "bullet and powder" now weight 0.12 Enc / shot

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.RN5mc97zk1Bd7jRx]{Improved Bullet and Powder}

Armour

Linen Armour

Armour made from countless layers of linen and other weaveable materials. Can be worn under any Metal or hard armour, but cannot be mixed with Soft Leather armour. For example you can wear Gambeson under Mail Shirt and Cuirass.

This type of armour can also be worn on top of armour for no change in performance.

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.LNdVWroLmPIXu5Dj]{Gambeson} – Protects Body and Arms

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.wkTgfXYKNDDUmL1m]{Gambeson Shirt} – Protects Body

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.BPcUiIKFMXSobKqC]{Gambeson Coat} – Protects Body Arms and Legs

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.X1OPgLRUhnJhjufW]{Long Gambeson} – Protects Body and Legs

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.iiYBwR0TRnrBefgp]{Gambeson Coif} – Protects Head

Leather Armour

Leather is a durable material that can take a beating. Sometimes it's not that good looking though.

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.OjcHE0VOGr1aRdy9]{Leather Jack}

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.ipaDvYY3qS66o593]{Leather Jerkin}

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.MzppW5E5c3by9iBU]{Leather Leggings}

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.0W0kEpa2kNEcRGK0]{Leather Skullcap}

Metal Armour

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.hWZ6H1jZ9jmte6yE]{Breastplate} – Protects only Frontal Body

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.VW2Sk5JPUrz7SLPH]{Cuirass} – Protects Body (equivalent of core @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.oBNXxRFPh1sOT4K2]{Plate Breastplate})

[TO DO: Real Full Plate Armour, super expensive, making Arrows Undamaging etc]

Weapons

Ranged

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.s3AUYnM2Vl6Y656l]{Old Bow} – Old bow, most likely passed down the generations. It's no longer as accurate and reliable as it once was, but is still potent enough

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.gkiR6r3tWAGQUOpf]{Light Bomb} – Throwable contraption filled with alchemical mixture (magnesium and improved blackpowder) that on detonation produces cloud of blinding light.

Melee

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.D7vu2rbIaVrwLWOi]{Cutlass} – favourite weapons of pirates. Can cause bleeding on unsuspecting victims.

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.W1b784w4bBVwtHZS]{Short Spear} – short version of Core @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-up-in-arms.items.Item.HxOhYpAxqdcyoSje]{Spear}

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.3uppxJFq3SQFpT2q]{Spear} – rebalanced one-handed version of Core @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-up-in-arms.items.Item.HxOhYpAxqdcyoSje]{Spear}

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.FR6vIPKu7cQ4Mkr8]{Spear (2h)} – version of a Core @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-up-in-arms.items.Item.HxOhYpAxqdcyoSje]{Spear} that can be used to stab or to pummel

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.ws5f2yvbXpHZSPob]{Pickaxe} – pick on one side, axe on the other. Truly lives up to its name.

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.84hccJzDfkfw3trc]{Torch (weapon)} – a torch, but you can smack goblins with it.

Wearables

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.X4RpXktd9IFzcbg6]{Ring of See Invisibility}

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.o9ZQVkJgmfYrm8Lw]{Ring of Smell}

Consumables

Potions now weight between 0.10 and 0.15 Enc depending on their size. Empty potion vial weights 0.05

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.VX5v3rgKUIyhE5CD]{Empty Vial}

Containers

Bags

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.a9ns2EksvvtdUvn4]{Potion Bag} – special type of sling bag that allows for easier and organized storage of potions

Pouches

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.izBtNy0denmW9BpV]{Shot Pouch} – pouch designed to hold shots used in slings. Can hold 12 shots.

Powder Horns

Archers need Quivers and gunners need Powder Horns. It's an item that stores gunpowder and allows to pour somewhat reliable amount of gunpowder into a barrel of a gun straight from the Horn.

It's assumed that each Horn comes with a small dedicated pouch for bullets.

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.749BhVdd0kr83pf6]{Powder Horn} – standard horn, holds enough gunpowder for 12 shots.

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.m0JzXLIjaskvNi5v]{Big Powder Horn} – bigger horn, holds enough gunpowder for 32 shots.

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.ZP2D38WdvD5iVd0F]{Fast Powder Horn} – practical horn that allows to reload guns a little bit faster, but holds only enough for 12 shots

Quivers

Archers and crossbowmen need quivers to be able to store arrows and bolts in a way that allows them to quickly fire next shot.

If they do not have quiver, they need to stab the arrows into the ground or place bolts on the ground.

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.gg1pfuy1Tk8hPoVl]{Hunter's Quiver} – Small quiver mainly used by Hunters that can hold up to 12 standard arrows

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.3HO7sk5rX9jQ6vYl]{Standard Quiver} – Most common type of quiver that can hold up to 30 standard arrows

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.ZfHEQs76E08LeAU7]{Archer's Quiver} – Quiver used by specialized military Archers when going into battle. Typical Archer carries two of those and each such quiver can hold up to 50 standard arrows.

Ingredients

Spell ingredients

Spell ingredients are used to cast spells with less risk. Best to generate dedicated ingredients using macro @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.macros.Macro.9W3cMh8pHiAdLl0y]{Generate Ingredient for Spell} and use that ingredient.

Base ingredients are: @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.Fyaz0um5STWsmcL7]{Aqshy Ingredient} @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.rX639Tm9dTFGgdEs]{Azyr Ingredient} @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.0Xe2tUDjV3jR2o17]{Chamon Ingredient} @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.0IzPuMHA4a4P0PYB]{Ghur Ingredient} @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.G4EdPUHqekDS6kj8]{Ghyran Ingredient} @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.gEnMIQ1x4ETY1gCB]{Hedgecraft Ingredient} @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.uCGbBeMU5TUZPoba]{Hysh Ingredient} @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.VuO1EDySwVbmtdcH]{Shyish Ingredient} @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.rsQryOWSCufQnNAC]{Ulgu Ingredient} @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.relq8BaanmuOaPEP]{Witchcraft Ingredient}

Light

@UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.HO61HXSO0PYVs4kK]{Torch} – Illuminates an area of 20 yards for about an hour.

Also added ATL Support for Core items:

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.BXGyC1YqjSy6ErTI]{Candle}

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.jCryH7kR8bJc9eoC]{Oil Lamp}

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.wTi7GD0yyAFZdfkc]{Lantern}

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.WTDH1NSk1ufd5vx9]{Storm Lantern}
